articles.description: Watch, follow live text updates and listen to BBC Test Match Special commentary as England Women host Sri Lanka Women in the third T20 at Derby.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka, third T20 - watch, listen & follow text

articles.description: World number two Aryna Sabalenka faces Zheng Qinwen for a place in the US Open women's semi-finals - live radio and text.
articles.title: US Open quarter-finals: Sabalenka v Zheng - radio & text

articles.description: Jenni Hermoso has filed a legal complaint over the kiss by Spanish football federation president Luis Rubiales after the Women's World Cup final.
articles.title: Hermoso files legal complaint over Rubiales kiss

articles.description: England's Jude Bellingham, Bukayo Saka and Harry Kane and seven Manchester City players are on the shortlist for the 2023 Ballon d'Or.
articles.title: England trio & Man City seven on Ballon d'Or shortlist

articles.description: England quartet Mille Bright, Rachel Daly, Mary Earps and Georgia Stanway are among the nominees for the women's Ballon d'Or, awarded to the best female footballer in 2023.
articles.title: Lionesses quartet among Ballon d'Or nominees

articles.description: England add Harry Brook to their 50-over squad to play New Zealand, giving the batter further chance to press his claim before the World Cup.
articles.title: Brook called up for NZ series as batting cover

articles.description: Sri Lanka batter Harshitha Samarawickrama hits a four to seal a seven-wicket victory and a historic T20 series win over England at Derby.
articles.title: Samarawickrama four seals historic Sri Lanka T20 win

articles.description: Manchester United have spent a record £1.19bn more on transfers over the past decade than they have recouped through player sales, according to a new study.
articles.title: Man Utd biggest net spenders over past decade

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers defends Jordan Henderson amid criticism from "morality officers" over the midfielder's move to Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: 'Morality officers' judging Henderson - Rodgers

articles.description: Scrum-half Faf de Klerk will make a 50th appearance for South Africa when the World Cup holders begin their defence against Scotland on Sunday.
articles.title: Springbok De Klerk to reach 50 caps against Scots
